name: Republic of Texas
startIntroPart1: Sam Houston, first president of the Republic, your people are proud and independent. Though they be rough-hewn poeple, even provincial, there is greatness about them. Guide them, and they will do what is right.
startIntroPart2: President Houston, soldier, statesman, and great voice of moderation, lead your people to glory! Boldest and grandest, they shall wear the Lone Star with honor and glory.
defeated: Damn... Looks like I yee'd my last haw.
introduction: Howdy, Cowboy! Welcome to the Lone Star State!
